definition: to access (a network)/to insert (a plug) into (a socket)
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: How to choose the standard access network which is consistent with carrier-grade?
sentences.chinese: 如何選擇符合電信級標準的接入網絡呢？

sentences.english: It focuses on Ethernet services access, aggregation and transmission in metro area.
sentences.chinese: 它着重於以太網服務的接入，匯聚和城域網傳輸。

sentences.english: The last stage may be full-service access network in the form of FTTH.
sentences.chinese: 第三個階則是採用FTTH形式的全業務接入。

sentences.english: All I need is a broadband connection.
sentences.chinese: 我只要一個寬帶接入就行了。

sentences.english: Chapter one introduced the current development of access network.
sentences.chinese: 第一章簡要介紹了接入網的發展現狀。

sentences.english: The Contact management mainly explained the Implement of the call-center.
sentences.chinese: 接入管理部分闡述客戶服務中心的應用。

sentences.english: Data on capacity of office switching machine include network Equipment since 2007.
sentences.chinese: 2007年起，局用交換機容量包含接入網設備容量。

sentences.english: Arpanet gets first international nodes, in England and Norway.
sentences.chinese: 阿帕網接入首批國際節點，位於英格蘭和挪威。

sentences.english: Full service operation's new requirements to access or backhaul networks.
sentences.chinese: 全業務運營對接入網或移動回程網的要求。

sentences.english: This paper studies the media access control protocol and key technologies in ultra-wideband wireless networks.
sentences.chinese: 該文研究超寬帶無線網絡的媒體接入控制技術和協議。

sentences.english: We can really see a market emerging for rich media access points.
sentences.chinese: 我們也確實看到了一個富媒體接入市場正在形成。
接入點映射與藍牙技術。

sentences.english: The article sets forth wideband IP access technique and relevant systems.
sentences.chinese: 本文闡述寬帶IP接入技術，以及相關係統。

sentences.english: The author studied the transient process of a full-wave bridge rectified filter when it was switched on in the circuit.
sentences.chinese: 研究了全波橋式整流濾波器接入電路時的暫態過程。

sentences.english: They can realize the inner call and can also connect into the public exchange network.
sentences.chinese: 既能夠實現內部呼叫也能接入市話交換網。

sentences.english: Just dial the access number given for the country you're calling from and wait for the prompt.
sentences.chinese: 只需撥打您所在國家的接入號碼並等待提示音。

definition: to open access/to establish contact/to remove a block/to put through (a phone connection)
to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
to open up (windows for air, ideas for discussion, transportation routes etc)
China United Telecommunications Corporation/aka China Unicom or Unicom/abbr. for 中國聯通|中国联通
to access/to transfer passengers between two railway lines
variant of 連接|连接[lian2 jie1]
